BACKUP_DETAIL1: A database file with name(poultry.db) will be shared/saved to backup your data.You can save it to anywhere (Whatsapp, Gmail, Google Drive, files, Bluetooth etc). You can restore it when data is lost or you want to use it on another phone.
RESTORE_DETAIL1: NOTE: Please select the (poultry.db) file you previously created a backup file. If you have not not downloaded it, download and and save it and then press Restore. If you want to use it on another phone, create a backup on Old phone & Restore on new phone. Don't Tap Restore now button if you have not lost your data.
AUTO_GENERATED_TRANS: This is an auto generated record through birds addition and reduction. To Edit or Delete this transaction go to Birds addition and reduction page.
AUTO_GENERATED_REC: This is an auto generated record through transactions. To Edit or Delete this record go to Transactions page.
Auto_addition: (Auto generated Birds addition will be created)
Auto_reduction: (Auto generated Birds reduction will be created)
Unsupported Operation Message: You cannot directly record a Flock Sale on Farm Wide. To record a Farm Wide Bird Sale choose bird sale from income categories.
MULTIPLE_OPERATIONS: This record is a part of multi flock transaction. View complete info to perform any action.
Some key changes made in this update: Some key changes made in this update
graph1: Now it‚Äôs easy to record birds purchase and sale as birds addition/reduction is auto linked to financial records. So, you just need to add or remove birds from a specific flock and app will allow you to specify financial information on the same page rather than recording it separately in finance module.
graph2: Similarly, On the other way around if you record an Income or Expense involving birds sale or purchase for a single flock or even involving multiple flocks or lets say farm wide then you have a new option to handle the case while recording an income or expense and it will auto generate a record for birds addition or reduction.

You can still activate your multi-user access by going to:
Settings ‚Üí Users & Roles ‚Üí MultiUser Plan.

farm_account_intro: A Farm Account gives you full control over your team with multi-user access and role-based permissions.
farm_account_benefit_users: Invite multiple users to your farm with their own login credentials.
farm_account_benefit_roles: Assign custom roles and manage permissions for each role.
farm_account_benefit_manage: Easily keep track of users and manage their access anytime.
farm_account_benefit_sync: Enjoy live, real-time data sync across all accounts.
farm_account_benefit_backup: Keeps your data safe and secure with regular backups.

farm_restore_warning_message:
You are using a Farm Account.

Farm accounts are automatically backed up and restored when you sign in, so you do not need to manually restore from your device or Google Drive.

‚ö† Restoring a local or Google Drive backup may cause serious issues such as mixing old data with your current farm records, creating duplicate entries, or corrupting your farm data.

Only continue if you fully understand the risks.
